content: this pretty textured hat with folded up ribbed brim is crocheted in row from side to side with the brim the body of the hat and the top crown part made all in one piece the pattern is quite easy to crochet once you get familiar with the special stitches used you will only need to repeat 4 row **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things my youtube channel 2 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 follow me on instagram 5 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 6 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www youtube com/@myhobbyiscrochetblog 3 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 4 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 5 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 6 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/
